function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low velocity personalized ventilation system may not effectively mitigate the propagation of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne infection transmission in built environments.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough performance testing and optimization of the ventilation system design.","Technologies":"Low velocity personalized ventilation system, airflow visualization technology.","People":"Occupants of built environments, especially in high occupation density areas such as hospitals, theaters, cinemas, airplanes.","Owner":"Researchers, building designers, and healthcare facilities."}]}
